desc: Waco Handcrafted is a candle company based out of Waco, Texas. All of our candles and wax melts are hand poured in small batches using only the finest wax and fragrance.

layout.text: Meet Chloe... she's pretty amazing and a great helper! She is the inspiration behind this business and the amazing candles that we make! Press the shop button below to see our newest creations.
